attributes.action: Make supermarkets pass the VAT reduction on to customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When the Prime Minister dropped the VAT rate to fifteen percent the main supermarkets in the UK conveniently overlooked this did not reduce their prices, safe in the knowledge that people will always need food. 
Call a stop to this  now and force supermarkets such as Tesco and Morrisons from making excessive profits at our expense.
